00030 #include "actuators.h"
00031 #include "paparazzi.h"
00032 #include "generated/airframe.h"
00033 
00034 uint8_t servos_4015_idx;
00035 uint32_t servos_delay = SERVO_REFRESH_TICS;
00036 
00037 #define START_TIMEOUT 0xFFFF;
00038 
00039 void actuators_init ( void ) {
00040   /* select clock pin as MAT0.1 output */
00041   IO0DIR |= _BV(SERVO_CLOCK_PIN);
00042   SERVO_CLOCK_PINSEL |= SERVO_CLOCK_PINSEL_VAL << SERVO_CLOCK_PINSEL_BIT;
00043 
00044   /* select reset pin as GPIO output */
00045   IO1DIR |= _BV(SERVO_RESET_PIN);
00046   PINSEL2 &= ~(_BV(3)); /* P1.25-16 are used as GPIO */
00047   /* assert RESET */
00048   IO1SET = _BV(SERVO_RESET_PIN);
00049 
00050   /* DATA pin output */
00051   IO1DIR |= _BV(SERVO_DATA_PIN);
00052 
00053   /* enable match 1 interrupt */
00054   T0MCR |= TMCR_MR1_I;
00055 
00056   /* lower clock         */
00057   T0EMR &= ~TEMR_EM1;
00058   /* set high on match 1 */
00059   T0EMR |= TEMR_EMC1_2;
00060 
00061   /* set first pulse in a while */
00062   T0MR1 = START_TIMEOUT;
00063   servos_4015_idx = _4015_NB_CHANNELS;
00064   /* Set all servos at their midpoints */
00065   /* compulsory for unaffected servos  */
00066   uint8_t i;
00067   for( i=0 ; i < _4015_NB_CHANNELS ; i++ )
00068     servos_values[i] = SERVOS_TICS_OF_USEC(1500);
00069 }
00070 
00071 
00072 uint16_t servos_values[_4015_NB_CHANNELS];
